comments.html:
Since the beginning of time, SR OS has had the notion of different port types: * Network facing ports (default) * User-facing access ports (untrusted) * Hybrid ports

For example, VXLAN is not accepted on user facing ports. I am pretty sure VTP isn't supported (though there may be others - all vendors have their oversights)

Time for a Netsim-Tools "hardening" plugin?
comments.name: Jeroen van Bemmel
